unacloud.share.entities.PhysicalMachineEntity

  • Packages that use PhysicalMachineEntity 
    Package Description
    unacloud.share.db
    In this package are located all classes to connect and execute SQL commands in database.
    unacloud.share.entities
    In this package are located all entities required to process transactions in database.
